trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville
There were 5 other sightings in Louisville on or around July 4th 2010
Summary: 2 orange/red orb objects flying through the air.
divs: sighting detailsi was at my girlfriends house after watching fireworks when she pointed out an orange\red orb that was soaring across the sky at a pretty good speed and then another one followed it and it kept flying into the distant. it was probably 2 or 3 times the size of a star and i watched it for about 5 minutes. if i was to compare it to something it would be a meteor falling, but it was obviously not a meteor because it was going side ways and looked to be about the same height that an airplane would be if not lower. i didnt really put too much thought into and went inside, but when my girlfriends parents went out to look at it, it was already gone. the only reason i thought it was something was because my girlfriend told me a couple days later that their had been other reports about the same type of objects.
